trans-unit.source: Getting Started | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Getting Started | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Začínáme | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn about capabilities and work scenarios in Business Central, a business management solution for small and mid-sized organizations.

seg-source.mrk: Learn about capabilities and work scenarios in Business Central, a business management solution for small and mid-sized organizations.

target.mrk: Zjistěte více o možnostech a pracovních scénářích v Business Central, řešení podnikového řízení pro malé a střední organizace.

trans-unit.source: Getting Started with [!INCLUDE[d365fin_long](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)]

seg-source.mrk: Getting Started with

target.mrk: Začínáme s

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] is a business management solution for small and mid-sized organizations that automates and streamlines business processes and helps you manage your business.

seg-source.mrk: is a business management solution for small and mid-sized organizations that automates and streamlines business processes and helps you manage your business.

target.mrk: je řešení pro správu podnikání pro malé a střední organizace, které automatizuje a zjednodušuje obchodní procesy a pomáhá vám spravovat vaše podnikání.

trans-unit.source: Signing up is easy, and you can migrate existing business data from your legacy system.

seg-source.mrk: Signing up is easy, and you can migrate existing business data from your legacy system.

target.mrk: Registrace je snadná a můžete přesunout stávající obchodní údaje z původního systému.

trans-unit.source: To help you with your subscription, find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

seg-source.mrk: To help you with your subscription, find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

target.mrk: Pro pomoc s Vaším předplatným vyhledejte [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partnera [zde](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

trans-unit.source: When you sign up for the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] preview you get access to a demonstration company.

seg-source.mrk: When you sign up for the [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] preview you get access to a demonstration company.

target.mrk: Pokud si zaregistrujete ukázku [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] dostanete přístup k demo firmě.

trans-unit.source: The demonstration company contains sample data, but you can create your own sales documents, for example, or set up a bank account.

seg-source.mrk: The demonstration company contains sample data, but you can create your own sales documents, for example, or set up a bank account.

target.mrk: Demonštrační společnost obsahuje ukázkové údaje, ale můžete například vytvořit vlastní prodejní doklady nebo si založit bankovní účet.

trans-unit.source: Get to know [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]

seg-source.mrk: Get to know

target.mrk: Poznat

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], some things will be familiar to you, and other things might be unfamiliar.

seg-source.mrk: In [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], some things will be familiar to you, and other things might be unfamiliar.

target.mrk: V [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], Vám některé věci budou známy a jiné zase ne

trans-unit.source: In the demonstration company, visual guides explain core functionality, and help you try out daily tasks like creating a sales invoice and viewing a report.

seg-source.mrk: In the demonstration company, visual guides explain core functionality, and help you try out daily tasks like creating a sales invoice and viewing a report.

target.mrk: V demonstrační společnosti vizuální průvodci vysvětlují základní funkce a pomáhají Vám vyzkoušet si každodenní úkoly, jako je vytvoření prodejní faktury a zobrazení sestavy.

trans-unit.source: If you leave a guide, for example, to explore [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] on your own, but want to return to it, go back to the Role Center and launch the Getting Started tour.

seg-source.mrk: If you leave a guide, for example, to explore [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] on your own, but want to return to it, go back to the Role Center and launch the Getting Started tour.

target.mrk: Pokud například opustíte průvodce, aby jste prozkoumali [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] sami, ale chcete se k němu vrátit, vraťte se do centra rolí a spusťte prohlídku Začínáme.

trans-unit.source: If you want more assistance, you can find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

seg-source.mrk: If you want more assistance, you can find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

target.mrk: Pokud chcete více pomoci, můžete najít [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partnera [zde](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

trans-unit.source: You can get back to the Role Center by selecting the company name in the upper left corner.

seg-source.mrk: You can get back to the Role Center by selecting the company name in the upper left corner.

target.mrk: Zpět do centra rolí se dostanete kliknutím na název společnosti v horním levém rohu.

trans-unit.source: For some quick, nice-to-know tricks, see:

seg-source.mrk: For some quick, nice-to-know tricks, see:

target.mrk: Některé rychlé, příjemné triky naleznete v:

trans-unit.source: [Find things](ui-search.md)

seg-source.mrk: Find things

target.mrk: Najít věci

trans-unit.source: [Searching, Filtering, and Sorting Lists](ui-enter-criteria-filters.md)

seg-source.mrk: Searching, Filtering, and Sorting Lists

target.mrk: Vyhledávání, Filtrování a Řazení seznamů

trans-unit.source: [Entering Data](ui-enter-data.md)

seg-source.mrk: Entering Data

target.mrk: Vkládání dat

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Working with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](ui-work-product.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Working with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](ui-work-product.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace se podívejte na [Práce s[!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](ui-work-product.md).

trans-unit.source: When you are ready to start working and you want to look at some of the business processes that [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] supports, see [Business Functionality](across-business-functionality.md).

seg-source.mrk: When you are ready to start working and you want to look at some of the business processes that [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] supports, see [Business Functionality](across-business-functionality.md).

target.mrk: Pokud jste připravení začít pracovat a chcete se podívat na některé z obchodních procesů, které [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] podporuje, běžte na [Obchodní Funkčnosti](across-business-functionality.md).

trans-unit.source: For an overview of current capabilities and what is coming, take a look at our release notes at [Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central Release Notes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2047422).

seg-source.mrk: For an overview of current capabilities and what is coming, take a look at our release notes at [Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central Release Notes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2047422).

target.mrk: Přehled současných možností a toho, co se chystá, najdete v našich dokumentech k vydání na [Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central Release Notes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2047422).

trans-unit.source: The Role Centers

seg-source.mrk: The Role Centers

target.mrk: Centra rolí

trans-unit.source: The Role Center page is based on a role-centric design to give you fast access to the business process and intelligence tools that you need to do your job.

seg-source.mrk: The Role Center page is based on a role-centric design to give you fast access to the business process and intelligence tools that you need to do your job.

target.mrk: Stránka Centrum rolí je založena na roli, která Vám umožní rychlý přístup k podnikovým procesům a nástrojům inteligence, které potřebujete pro Vaši práci.

trans-unit.source: For example, an accountant can monitor payments and approvals, and view finance performance charts.

seg-source.mrk: For example, an accountant can monitor payments and approvals, and view finance performance charts.

target.mrk: Například účetní může sledovat platby a schválení a zobrazit grafy výkonnosti financí.

trans-unit.source: Check out the various Role Center by choosing the **Settings** icon ![Settings](media/ui-experience/settings_icon_small.png "Settings icon for role center") in the top right corner, choosing **My Settings**, and then the Role Center to explore.

seg-source.mrk: Check out the various Role Center by choosing the **Settings** icon ![Settings](media/ui-experience/settings_icon_small.png "Settings icon for role center") in the top right corner, choosing **My Settings**, and then the Role Center to explore.

target.mrk: Vyzkoušejte různá Centra rolí pomocí tlačítka **Nastavení** ![Nastavení](media/ui-experience/settings_icon_small.png "") v pravém horním rohu, dále vyberte **Má Nastavení**, klikněte na Centrum rolí k přehledu rolí.

trans-unit.source: Sign in again to apply the change.

seg-source.mrk: Sign in again to apply the change.

target.mrk: Chcete-li provést změnu, přihlaste se znovu.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Changing Basic Settings](ui-change-basic-settings.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Changing Basic Settings](ui-change-basic-settings.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace se podívejte na [Změna základního nastavení](ui-change-basic-settings.md).

trans-unit.source: Each Role Center provides a **Setup and Extensions** button.

seg-source.mrk: Each Role Center provides a **Setup and Extensions** button.

target.mrk: Každé centrum rolí poskytuje tlačítko **Instalace a Rozšíření**.

trans-unit.source: Here you have access to a list of assisted setup that can help you get started by setting selected areas up quickly.

seg-source.mrk: Here you have access to a list of assisted setup that can help you get started by setting selected areas up quickly.

target.mrk: Zde máte přístup k seznamu asistovaných nastavení, které Vám může pomoci začít díky rychlým nastavením vybraných oblastí.

trans-unit.source: If an area is not covered by an assisted setup, choose the **Manual Setup** action to access setup pages where you can fill in setup fields for all areas manually.

seg-source.mrk: If an area is not covered by an assisted setup, choose the **Manual Setup** action to access setup pages where you can fill in setup fields for all areas manually.

target.mrk: Pokud není možno nastavit oblast pomocí asistovaných nastavením, vyberte akci **Manuální nastavení** pro přístup na nastavovací stránky, kde můžete ručně vyplnit daná pole pro nastavení všech oblastí.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see also [Setting Up [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](setup.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see also [Setting Up [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](setup.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace se podívejte na [Nastavení[!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]](setup.md).

trans-unit.source: The list of setup guides, extensions, and services that are available differ depending on the user experience you choose for your company.

seg-source.mrk: The list of setup guides, extensions, and services that are available differ depending on the user experience you choose for your company.

target.mrk: Seznam průvodců nastavení, rozšíření a služeb, které jsou k dispozici se liší v závislosti na uživatelském prostředí, jaké si vyberete pro svou společnost.

trans-unit.source: The **Essential** experience gives access to fewer than the **Premium** experience does.

seg-source.mrk: The **Essential** experience gives access to fewer than the **Premium** experience does.

target.mrk: **Essential** nabízí menší přístup v aplikaci než **Premium**.

trans-unit.source: The first time you sign in, you use the Essential experience.

seg-source.mrk: The first time you sign in, you use the Essential experience.

target.mrk: Při prvním přihlašování používáte Essentials.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Changing Which Features are Displayed](ui-experiences.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Changing Which Features are Displayed](ui-experiences.md).

target.mrk: Pro další informace se podívejte na [Změna zobrazování funkcí](ui-experiences.md).

trans-unit.source: On the **Assisted Setup** page, you will find the following with the **Essential** experience:

seg-source.mrk: On the **Assisted Setup** page, you will find the following with the **Essential** experience:

target.mrk: Na stránce **Asistovaná nastavení** s **Essentials** najdete následující položky

trans-unit.source: Assisted Setup

seg-source.mrk: Assisted Setup

target.mrk: Asistovaná nastavení

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Popis

trans-unit.source: Migrate Business Data

seg-source.mrk: Migrate Business Data

target.mrk: Migrace obchodních dat

trans-unit.source: Lets you import your existing company data such as vendors, customers, and items from Excel or Quickbooks.

seg-source.mrk: Lets you import your existing company data such as vendors, customers, and items from Excel or Quickbooks.

target.mrk: Umožňuje importovat stávající data společnosti, jako jsou prodejci, zákazníci a zboží z Excelu nebo Quickbooks.

trans-unit.source: Set Up My Company

seg-source.mrk: Set Up My Company

target.mrk: Založit mojí společnost

trans-unit.source: Creates a new trial company for you to enter data and try out [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Creates a new trial company for you to enter data and try out [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Vytvoří pro vás novou zkušební společnost pro zadávání dat a vyzkoušení [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If you went through the Getting Started tour this is probably already **Completed**.

seg-source.mrk: If you went through the Getting Started tour this is probably already **Completed**.

target.mrk: Pokud jste prošli prohlídkou Začínáme, je to pravděpodobně již **dokončená**.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Cash Flow Forecast

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Cash Flow Forecast

target.mrk: Nastavit prognózy Cash Flow

trans-unit.source: Sets up the Cash Flow Forecast chart, so you can view the predicted movement of cash in and out of your business.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the Cash Flow Forecast chart, so you can view the predicted movement of cash in and out of your business.

target.mrk: Nastaví graf prognózy Cash Flow, aby jste mohli prohlížet předpokládaný pohyb hotovosti ve vaší společnosti.

trans-unit.source: The chart is available on the **Accountant Role Center**.

seg-source.mrk: The chart is available on the **Accountant Role Center**.

target.mrk: Graf je dostupný v **Centru rolí - Účetní**.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Approval Workflows

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Approval Workflows

target.mrk: Nastavení workflow schvalování

trans-unit.source: Sets up the ability to automatically notify an approver when a user tries to create or change certain values on documents, journal lines, or cards, such as an amount above a specified limit.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the ability to automatically notify an approver when a user tries to create or change certain values on documents, journal lines, or cards, such as an amount above a specified limit.

target.mrk: Nastavuje možnost automaticky informovat schvalovatele, když se uživatel pokusí vytvořit nebo změnit určité hodnoty v dokumentech, řádcích deníku nebo na kartách, jako je částka nad zadaným limitem.

trans-unit.source: Set Up a Customer Approval Workflow

seg-source.mrk: Set Up a Customer Approval Workflow

target.mrk: Nastavení workflow schvalování zákazníka

trans-unit.source: Sets up the ability to automatically notify an approver when a user tries to create or change a customer card.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the ability to automatically notify an approver when a user tries to create or change a customer card.

target.mrk: Nastavuje možnost automaticky informovat schvalovatele když se uživatel pokusí vytvořit nebo změnit údaje na kartě zákazníka.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Email

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Email

target.mrk: Nastavení e-mailu

trans-unit.source: Gets you ready for sending email messages directly from, for example, sales orders or contacts in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Gets you ready for sending email messages directly from, for example, sales orders or contacts in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Připraví Vás k odesílání e-mailových zpráv přímo, např.: z prodejních objednávek nebo kontaktů v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Set Up Email Logging

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Email Logging

target.mrk: Nastavení protokolování e-mailů

trans-unit.source: Sets up the capability to log email correspondence in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] to follow up on interactions.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the capability to log email correspondence in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] to follow up on interactions.

target.mrk: Nastavuje možnost protokolování e-mailové korespondence v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] pro následující interakce.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Outlook for [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Outlook for

target.mrk: Nastavení pro Outlook

trans-unit.source: Sets up the ability to use and launch [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] from Outlook.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the ability to use and launch [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] from Outlook.

target.mrk: Nastavuje možnost použití a spuštění [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] z aplikace Outlook.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Reporting

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Reporting

target.mrk: Nastavení Reportingu

trans-unit.source: Sets up data sets that you can use to build powerful reports using Excel or Power BI, for example.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up data sets that you can use to build powerful reports using Excel or Power BI, for example.

target.mrk: Nastavuje datové sady, které můžete použít například k vytváření sestav pomocí Excelu nebo Power BI.

trans-unit.source: Set Up an Item Approval Workflow

seg-source.mrk: Set Up an Item Approval Workflow

target.mrk: Nastavení workflow schvalování zboží

trans-unit.source: Sets up the ability to send a notification to an approver when a user changes or creates an item.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the ability to send a notification to an approver when a user changes or creates an item.

target.mrk: Nastavuje možnost odesílat oznámení schvalovateli, když uživatel změní nebo vytvoří zboží.

trans-unit.source: Set Up a Payment Approval Workflow

seg-source.mrk: Set Up a Payment Approval Workflow

target.mrk: Nastavit workflow schvalování plateb

trans-unit.source: Sets up the ability to send a notification to an approver when a user sends payment journal lines for approval.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up the ability to send a notification to an approver when a user sends payment journal lines for approval.

target.mrk: Nastavuje možnost odeslat oznámení schvalovateli, když uživatel odešle řádky platebního deníku ke schválení.

trans-unit.source: Set Up the Business Central Connector

seg-source.mrk: Set Up the Business Central Connector

target.mrk: Nastavení Business Central Conectoru

trans-unit.source: Sets up a connection to Dynamics 365 for Sales, which allows you to synchronize data such as contacts and sales order information.

seg-source.mrk: Sets up a connection to Dynamics 365 for Sales, which allows you to synchronize data such as contacts and sales order information.

target.mrk: Nastavuje připojení k Dynamics 365 for Sales, které Vám umožní synchronizovat data jako jsou kontakty a informace o prodejních objednávkách.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Sales Tax

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Sales Tax

target.mrk: Nastavení DPH

trans-unit.source: Gets you started with default tax groups and assigning tax area codes that you can assign to customers and vendors in order to automatically calculate sales tax in sales or purchase documents.

seg-source.mrk: Gets you started with default tax groups and assigning tax area codes that you can assign to customers and vendors in order to automatically calculate sales tax in sales or purchase documents.

target.mrk: Začínáte s výchozími daňovými skupinami a přiřazováním kódů daňových oblastí, které můžete přiřadit zákazníkům a prodejcům, abyste mohli automaticky vypočítat daň z obratu v prodejních nebo nákupních dokladech.

trans-unit.source: Trying things out in your own company

seg-source.mrk: Trying things out in your own company

target.mrk: Vyzkoušejte si věci ve vaší vlastní společnosti

trans-unit.source: Thinking about subscribing?

seg-source.mrk: Thinking about subscribing?

target.mrk: Přemýšlíte nad předplatným?

trans-unit.source: You can easily change from the demonstration company, and create and work in a company of your own.

seg-source.mrk: You can easily change from the demonstration company, and create and work in a company of your own.

target.mrk: Můžete snadno změnit vaší demo společnost. Jednoduše můžete vytvořit novou vlastní a pracovat s ní.

trans-unit.source: This is a great way to start toward a subscription.

seg-source.mrk: This is a great way to start toward a subscription.

target.mrk: Je to skvělý způsob, jak začít s předplatným.

trans-unit.source: Setups for finances are provided; you just need to create or import your customers, vendors, and the products or services that you sell.

seg-source.mrk: Setups for finances are provided; you just need to create or import your customers, vendors, and the products or services that you sell.

target.mrk: Nastavení financí jsou již nachystány, stačí pouze vytvořit nebo importovat zákazníky, dodavatele, zboží nebo služby, které prodáváte.

trans-unit.source: After that, you're ready to post invoices and use business intelligence tools to analyze your business.

seg-source.mrk: After that, you're ready to post invoices and use business intelligence tools to analyze your business.

target.mrk: Poté jste připraveni k účtování faktur a použít nástroje BI k analýze vašeho obchodu.

trans-unit.source: You can use your company for free for a 30-day trial period.

seg-source.mrk: You can use your company for free for a 30-day trial period.

target.mrk: Vaši společnost můžete používat zdarma po dobu 30 dnů.

trans-unit.source: If you subscribe to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] during that time, you're already up and running.

seg-source.mrk: If you subscribe to [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] during that time, you're already up and running.

target.mrk: Pokud se během této doby přihlásíte k předplatnému [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] již budete v provozu.

trans-unit.source: You can continue with the work you did during the trial.

seg-source.mrk: You can continue with the work you did during the trial.

target.mrk: Budete moci pokračovat v prácí, kterou jste udělali v rámci zkušebního období.

trans-unit.source: To create a company to try things out, go to the **My Settings** menu in the top right corner, and change the company to **My Company**.

seg-source.mrk: To create a company to try things out, go to the **My Settings** menu in the top right corner, and change the company to **My Company**.

target.mrk: K vytvoření zkušební společnosti, běžte do menu **Má nastavení** v pravém horním rohu a změňte společnost v poli **Společsnot**.

trans-unit.source: Sign out of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and then sign in again to apply the change.

seg-source.mrk: Sign out of [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and then sign in again to apply the change.

target.mrk: Odhlačte se z [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a poté se připojte znovu pro provedení změn.

trans-unit.source: An assisted setup guide will help you provide basic information about your company.

seg-source.mrk: An assisted setup guide will help you provide basic information about your company.

target.mrk: Průvodce nastavením Vám pomůže zadat základní informace o vaší společnosti.

trans-unit.source: When that's done, explore the Role Center and find the **Assisted Setup** action.

seg-source.mrk: When that's done, explore the Role Center and find the **Assisted Setup** action.

target.mrk: Jakmile nastavení bude hotové, projděte Centra rolí a najděte tlačítko **Asistovaná nastavení**.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

seg-source.mrk: Alternatively, find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

target.mrk: Alternativně najděte [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partnera[zde](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

trans-unit.source: Getting answers to questions

seg-source.mrk: Getting answers to questions

target.mrk: Odpovědi na otázky

trans-unit.source: If you are not sure how to do something in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you can hopefully find the answer either from reading the tooltip for the field that you are unsure of, or by reading the content by opening the *Learn more* link in a tooltip.

seg-source.mrk: If you are not sure how to do something in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you can hopefully find the answer either from reading the tooltip for the field that you are unsure of, or by reading the content by opening the *Learn more* link in a tooltip.

target.mrk: Pokud si nejste jisti, jak něco udělat v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], můžete snadno najít odpověď buď přečtením popisku pole nebo přečtením obsahu otevřením pomocí odkazu *Další informace* v nápovědě.

trans-unit.source: You can also get to the documentation by choosing the related link in the Help menu.

seg-source.mrk: You can also get to the documentation by choosing the related link in the Help menu.

target.mrk: K dokumentaci se také můžete dostat výběrem příslušného odkazu v nabídce Nápovědy.

trans-unit.source: All fields in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] are described in tooltips.

seg-source.mrk: All fields in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] are described in tooltips.

target.mrk: Všechna pole v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jsou popsána pomocí tooltipu (popisek pole).

trans-unit.source: You can access tooltips by choosing the name of the field.

seg-source.mrk: You can access tooltips by choosing the name of the field.

target.mrk: K tooltipu se dostanete najetím myší na název pole.

trans-unit.source: For example, in a page like the **Customer Card**, simply choose the name of the field to read the tooltip.

seg-source.mrk: For example, in a page like the **Customer Card**, simply choose the name of the field to read the tooltip.

target.mrk: Například na stránce, jako je **karta zákazníka**, jednoduše vyberte název pole a přečtěte si nápovědu.

trans-unit.source: In a list such as the **Customers** list, or the lines in a document such as a sales order, you have to choose the drop-down menu to the right of the name of the column and then choose the **What's this?** menu item.

seg-source.mrk: In a list such as the **Customers** list, or the lines in a document such as a sales order, you have to choose the drop-down menu to the right of the name of the column and then choose the **What's this?** menu item.

target.mrk: Na seznamu, například v seznamu **Zákazníci**, nebo v řádcích v dokumentu, jako je například prodejní objednávka, musíte vybrat rozbalovací nabídku napravo od názvu sloupce a poté zvolit možnost **Co je to?**.

trans-unit.source: If you have additional questions, we recommend that you ask the community or contact your reselling partner.

seg-source.mrk: If you have additional questions, we recommend that you ask the community or contact your reselling partner.

target.mrk: Pokud máte další otázky, doporučujeme se zeptat komunity nebo kontaktovat Vašeho partnera.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Where do I go if I have questions?](across-faq.md#where-do-i-go-if-i-have-questions).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Where do I go if I have questions?](across-faq.md#where-do-i-go-if-i-have-questions).

target.mrk: Pro další informace se podívejte na [Kam mám jít, pokud mám dotazy?](across-faq.md#where-do-i-go-if-i-have-questions).

trans-unit.source: Ready to subscribe?

seg-source.mrk: Ready to subscribe?

target.mrk: Jste připraveni k odběru?

trans-unit.source: Each time you sign in during the trial period, a notification in a blue bar at the top displays the time remaining.

seg-source.mrk: Each time you sign in during the trial period, a notification in a blue bar at the top displays the time remaining.

target.mrk: Pokaždé, když se během zkušebního období přihlásíte, oznámení v modrém pruhu nahoře zobrazuje zbývající čas .

trans-unit.source: If you decide to subscribe, find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

seg-source.mrk: If you decide to subscribe, find a [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partner [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

target.mrk: Pokud se rozhodnete pro předplatné, najděte [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] partnera [Zde](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/solution-providers/search).

trans-unit.source: You can also contact the [[!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] Sales team](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=828707).

seg-source.mrk: You can also contact the [[!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] Sales team](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=828707).

target.mrk: Také můžete kontaktovat[[!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]Prodejní tým](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=828707).

trans-unit.source: Other Dynamics 365 apps

seg-source.mrk: Other Dynamics 365 apps

target.mrk: Ostatní aplikace Dynamics 365.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to content about the other Dynamics 365 apps by choosing the [Dynamics 365](https://docs.microsoft.com/dynamics365) link in the blue banner at the top of this page.

seg-source.mrk: Navigate to content about the other Dynamics 365 apps by choosing the [Dynamics 365](https://docs.microsoft.com/dynamics365) link in the blue banner at the top of this page.

target.mrk: Přejděte na obsah dalších aplikací Dynamics 365 výběrem odkazu [Dynamics 365](https://docs.microsoft.com/dynamics365) na modrém proužku v horní části této stránky.

trans-unit.source: You can also learn more at the [Dynamics 365 Business Central website](https://dynamics.microsoft.com/en-us/business-central/overview/).

seg-source.mrk: You can also learn more at the [Dynamics 365 Business Central website](https://dynamics.microsoft.com/en-us/business-central/overview/).

target.mrk: Více se toho můžete dozvědět na webové stránce [Dynamics 365 Business Central](https://dynamics.microsoft.com/en-us/business-central/overview/).

trans-unit.source: If you are an accountant, you can sign up for [!INCLUDE[d365acc_long](includes/d365acc_long_md.md)] and have seamless integration with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: If you are an accountant, you can sign up for [!INCLUDE[d365acc_long](includes/d365acc_long_md.md)] and have seamless integration with [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Pokud jste účetní, můžete se zaregistrovat k [!INCLUDE[d365acc_long](includes/d365acc_long_md.md)] a mít bezproblémovou integraci s [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Welcome to Dynamics 365 — Accountant Hub](/dynamics365/accountants/index).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Welcome to Dynamics 365 — Accountant Hub](/dynamics365/accountants/index).

target.mrk: Další informace naleznete v části [Vítejte v Dynamics 365 - Účetní centrum](/dynamics365/accountants/index).
